definition.value:
Sɛ wopɛ sɛ sms-messaging yɛ adwuma a kɔ System -> Settings -> IM
na paw Twilio sɛ default sms-driver. Mma wo werɛ mmfi sɛ wobɛma ɔfã a wopɛ sɛ wo nsa ka sms fi (admin anaa storefront) no yɛ adwuma.
Saa ntrɛwmu yi bɛma Mobile Phone field no atumi ama admins ne customers de ama. Kae sɛ sɛ wogyae saa ntrɛwmu yi a, ɛbɛma saa afuw yi asie. Sɛ wode ka sotɔɔ a ɛwɔ hɔ dedaw a adetɔfo ka ho a, ma ɛntra w’adwenem sɛ saa nsɛm yi bɛyera.
Ɔsomafo (Twilio) Telefon: Ɔsomafo no telefon nɔma wɔ amanaman ntam kwan so (ex. +14158675309)
Sɔ Wo Nkitahodi Hwɛ: Wubetumi asɔ ahwɛ sɛ API adansedi nkrataa a wode ahyɛ mu no teɛ anaa.
Mfomso Logging Status Sɛ wopɛ sɛ wo log Twilio ntrɛwmu no mfomso nyinaa a, dan nhyehyɛe yi ON.
Mobile Phone a Wɔde Di Dwuma
Mfomsoɔ! Yɛsrɛ wo hwɛ sɛ wɔadan extension no ON anaa.
Nkitahodi no ayɛ yiye na wɔahyehyɛ API Credentials no yiye.
Ɔsomafo (Twilio) Telefon: Ɔsomafo no telefon nɔma wɔ amanaman ntam kwan so (ex. +14158675309)
